name: WWU Flight Center
about: Walla Walla University Flight Center is a premier aviation training institution located at Walla Walla Regional Airport in Washington. With a reputation for quality and professionalism, the flight center offers comprehensive training programs for private, instrument, and commercial pilot licenses, as well as multi-engine ratings. Students benefit from one-on-one and classroom ground training, advanced simulators, and a fleet of well-maintained aircraft. The program is integrated with the university's academic curriculum, allowing students to pursue a four-year or optional two-year degree in aviation. Known for its experienced instructors, great staff, and commitment to safety, WWU Flight Center is highly recommended for those seeking a top-notch aviation education and a successful career in the aviation industry.
